lessons.japanese: 学生は各々順番に卒業証書を受け取った。
lessons.english: Each student received his diploma in turn.

lessons.japanese: 学生たちは各々その会合に出席しなければならない。
lessons.english: Each of the students has to attend the meeting.

lessons.japanese: 各々の乗客には荷物二つの制限がある。
lessons.english: There is a limit of two pieces of luggage for each passenger.

lessons.japanese: これらの語を各々使って文を作りなさい。
lessons.english: Make a sentence with each of these words.

lessons.japanese: 学生は各々順番に卒業証書を受け取った。
lessons.english: Each student received his diploma in turn.

lessons.japanese: 学生たちは各々その会合に出席しなければならない。
lessons.english: Each of the students has to attend the meeting.

lessons.japanese: 各々の乗客には荷物二つの制限がある。
lessons.english: There is a limit of two pieces of luggage for each passenger.

lessons.japanese: これらの語を各々使って文を作りなさい。
lessons.english: Make a sentence with each of these words.

lessons.japanese: 各々が、自分自身のためになる決断をしていく必要がある。
lessons.english: Everyone needs to decide for themselves.

lessons.english: Everyone needs to decide for themselves.
